Title: There is irrefutable evidence that the rotten heads of the United Departments plotted to instigate a "Second Shanghai Riot"! They cannot get away with it!
Designer: Red Flag Commune of the "Shanghai Art Department" of the Worker-Peasant-Soldier Film Studio (《上艺司》工农兵电影制片厂红旗公社)Red Flag Corps of the "Publishing Department" of the Shanghai Municipal Print Technology Research Office (《版司》上海市印刷技术研究所红旗兵团)
Publisher: Red Flag Commune of the "Shanghai Art Department" of the Worker-Peasant-Soldier Film Studio, Red Flag Corps of the "Publishing Department" of the Shanghai Municipal Print Technology Research Office (《上艺司》工农兵电影制片厂红旗公社，《版司》上海市印刷技术研究所红旗兵团（宣）)
Notes: The text on the armband: Rebel team (造反隊 - simplified 造反队, Zaofan dui).
